name: Anthoni Mathias
description: Anthoni Mathias (SÃ£o Paulo, September 16, 1995), better known by his online nickname Tony , is a streamer, former League of Legends professional player and Brazilian businessman. He last served in the competitive scene as a mid laner of the RED Canids team and has worked at Submarino Stars as a player and content creator. Tony has already competed in the Brazilian League of Legends Championship for the CNB e-Sport Club and, as a reserve, but with significant participation in the playoffs, was part of the RED Canids squad that won thefirststage of the competition in 2017 and played in the Mid-Season Invitational , world championship held in Brazil.
